name: Two games, one score (TETRIS and ARKANOID)
name_original: Two games, one score (TETRIS and ARKANOID)
description:
You've played Arkanoid. 

You've played Tetris. 

But have you played them togehter?

Controls:
A or LEFT/D or RIGHT to move figures
W or UP to rotate figures  
S or DOWN to speed everything up
